question: As shown in <image 1>, the fact that your cell phone is using outdated technology within a year or two of purchase is an example of ____________.
description: The image shows a collection of old mobile phones with various designs and conditions. Some phones have physical keyboards, while others have touchscreens. The phones appear to be from different eras, with some looking more modern and others appearing quite dated. The phones are piled together, indicating they are no longer in use. The variety of designs and the apparent age of the phones suggest that they have been replaced by newer models over time.
